title: Frontend Web Development
description: Full-stack web development refers to the practice of creating web applications that encompass both the front-end and back-end components. It involves designing, developing, and maintaining all aspects of a web application, making it functional and interactive for users.

title: Full Stack development (MERN)
description: Front-end web development, also known as client-side development, is the process of creating the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) components of a website or web application. Front-end developers are responsible for translating design concepts into interactive and visually appealing digital experiences that users can interact with directly through their web browsers.
